Ie 5 0 For Macintosh Is Available

27 Mar 2000

\nFinally, Mac users get to use the version 5.x features in Internet Explorer. \n

\n

\nIt has a few features that are kind of nifty like options for chrome color, something called "Internet Scrapbook" which looks like a more permanent cache, and, best of all, a new, faster, better, more compliant rendering engine.\n

\n

\nIt also has variable font sizing, an auction manager (for ebay addicts) and a search assistant.\n

\n

\nDownload it from Microsoft now and beat the rush.\n

\nbob\n
